item.title: One Character From Amazon's Fallout Series Is Primed For a Video Game Appearance
item.description:
Highlights

  • The snake oil salesman in Amazon's Fallout series is a hilarious and intriguing character with potential to become a classic NPC in Fallout 5.
  • Despite his sleazy appearance, the salesman's quick thinking and questionable medicine have deeper implications that make him a fascinating character.
  • As a recurring character with potential for funny and interesting quests, the snake oil salesman could add a unique and entertaining element to Fallout 5.

The wastelands of Fallout are filled with colorful characters and NPCs. Amazon's Fallout series did a great job at encapsulating the diversity of the people who inhabit the wasteland in the centuries of the aftermath following the Great War, and one character made specifically for the Fallout TV series would make for a fantastic NPC in Fallout 5 . The snake oil salesman is a recurring character in Amazon's Fallout , and appears in three episodes across the series. Aside from consistent comic relief, he has the makings of a great video game NPC, much like M'aiq the Liar from Skyrim , who appears in every game in The Elder Scrolls without much explanation.

Despite only appearing in three episodes, the snake oil salesman fulfills a character archetype of a recurring side character who gets by with only their wiles. His "medicine", which he uses to heal Thaddeus from an injury, but likely also transforms him into a ghoul, also comes with implications that make him far more interesting than his sleazy exterior communicates. While he doesn't have the makings of a major character, he has every characteristic needed for an interesting Fallout NPC.

How Amazon's Fallout Created a Character Who Could Become a Classic

The snake oil salesman in Fallout makes his first appearance in episode two of the series, where Maximus saves him from being killed by an irate chicken farmer. Maximus deescalates the situation, and the salesman is seen later on the outskirts of Filly. The crowd on the main road to Filly doesn't give the snake oil salesman a much better reception than the farmer, and his attempts to get the attention of passersby by noticing any possible maladies they may have and yelling that he has the cure for them doesn't help him. He's a recurring character throughout episode two, and an observer of the violence that happens throughout the episode.

His most interesting moment, however, happens in episode seven, where a severely injured Thaddeus sees the snake oil salesman about his mutilated foot. The salesman uses quick thinking to talk Thaddeus out of killing him and creates a concoction that Thaddeus inhales that instantly heals his injured foot. Thaddeus is incredibly grateful and pays the snake oil salesman with a fusion core. However, not everything is as it seems, and later it's implied that the medicine has triggered Thaddeus' transformation into a ghoul.

The Possible Future Roles of the Snake Oil Salesman in Fallout 5

Any Fallout 5 release is still likely to be some years away, but the snake oil salesman would be a great addition to it when it's released. As a recurring character, the snake oil salesman works well as a commentator on the setting, much like M'aiq the Liar in The Elder Scrolls , or Conrad Verner in Mass Effect . The snake oil salesman also has the potential to give funny and interesting quests that don't have to be epic but could still be fun and well-written and shine a light on the setting.

This wouldn't be the first time that the snake oil salesman appears in a Fallout game, as he appears in Fallout Shelter . He comes with a Sleazy Suit, and is notable for his S.P.E.C.I.A.L stats, most of which are mediocre except for his 8 Charisma and 8 Intelligence. Quests involving him in Fallout 5 could involve rescuing him from raiders, retrieving his goods, or possibly being scammed by him and getting retribution later.

item.title: Squad Busters Creator Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Squad Busters , Supercell's latest mobile game sensation, has taken the gaming world by storm. It combines beloved characters from four of Supercell's other hit games, creating a unique and exciting experience for players. As many newcomers dive into the game, they look for ways to quickly master the mechanics to win matches and increase their rating.

One effective strategy is to learn from experienced content creators who share tutorials and tips. You can use Squad Busters Creator Codes to show your appreciation for their helpful content. While not all YouTubers and streamers are part of the Content Creator Boost program, many are, and redeeming their code is a great way to say thanks while supporting their work.

Updated July 13, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This article has been updated to reflect current information. Check back later to stay tuned.

All Squad Busters Creator Codes

  • Rick - Redeem this code to support Rick
  • PAN - Redeem this code to support PAN
  • Dani - Redeem this code to support Dani
  • MOLT - Redeem this code to support MOLT
  • clashjo - Redeem this code to support Kenny Jo
  • Havoc - Redeem this code to support HaVoc Gaming
  • OJ - Redeem this code to support Orange Juice Gaming
  • BT1 - Redeem this code to support BenTimm1
  • SKAREX - Redeem this code to support Skarex
  • Spen - Redeem this code to support SpenLC​​​​
  • dantegamesyt - Redeem this code to support Dante Games
  • AshBS - Redeem this code to support Ash Mobile Gaming
  • artube - Redeem this code to support Artube
  • aurum - Redeem this code to support AuRuM TV
  • heybrother - Redeem this code to support the Content Creator
  • klaus - Redeem this code to support Klaus
  • Bash - Redeem this code to support Clash Bashing.
  • VidraPlay - Redeem this code to support VidraPlay
  • spanser - Redeem this code to support Spanser
  • WithZack - Redeem this code to support WithZack

Creator codes are unique tags given to content creators in the Content Creator Boost program. By redeeming the creator code and making in-game purchases, a percentage of your spending is donated to that creator. Since the game is new, the list of content creators is small, but over time, it will only expand.

How to Redeem Creator Codes in Squad Busters

Redeeming Сreator codes in Squad Busters is not hard, and the process mirrors other Supercell games. It will take you a few clicks, and if you don't know how to redeem Creator codes, follow the steps below:

  • Go to the main menu of the game.
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the last one, which says Shop.
  • When you open the Shop, scroll to the end until you see the Content Creator Boost section. Once you find it, click the Enter Code button at the bottom of the section.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a pink Enter button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste the desired creator code into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the pink Enter button to complete.

If you did everything correctly, you will see the author you support in the Content Creator Boost section. You can stop supporting the author or change it to another one if you wish.

How to Get More Squad Busters Creator Codes

To find more Squad Busters Creator Codes, follow your favorite creators on social media platforms like YouTube or Twitch. They often share their codes directly in videos, descriptions, livestreams, or other publications.

How to Redeem Codes in The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross

Redeeming codes in this game is slightly different from other similar games and varies from platform to platform, so players can find step-by-step instructions below.

For PC and iOS Users

  • Visit The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross code redemption website.
  • Find a Netmarble ID, which can be found under the player info section within the game.
  • Choose the server.
  • Enter the desired code into the designated "Enter coupon code" field.
  • Check the in-game mailbox for rewards.

For Android Users

  • Launch The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross.
  • Tap the Menu button located in the bottom-right corner.
  • Select the "Misc" option.
  • Select the "Coupons" in the bottom left corner.
  • Enter the code and tap on the "Redeem" button.

The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Tips and Tricks

  • Daily Tasks: Begin each day by completing the tasks in the quest log, which depend on the story's progress.
  • Fort Solgres: In this dungeon, gather bugs, enhanced potions, and gold, while also earning SSR pendants.
  • PvP: Engage in ungeared PvP battles to improve rank and receive valuable rewards. Stay updated on evolving strategies.
  • Knighthood Boss: Collaborate with Knighthood for boss encounters, collecting Knighthood coins, and increasing rank for shop privileges.
  • Demonic Beast Battle: This mode becomes significant in the late game, providing holy relics for character improvements.
  • Prioritize the Storyline: It yields precious gems and unlocks crucial game elements.

How to Get More The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes

Players can find new codes on the developer's Twitter account, where they can also find news about updates and other interesting things. In addition, fans can bookmark this article to make sure they don't miss any new codes because this article is updated every month.

The Best Anime Games Like The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes

These days, players are spoiled for choice when it comes to anime-inspired video games, with hundreds of solid options all just a few clicks away. Below, players can find five of the best games like The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross , all of which are well worth checking out.

  • One Punch Man: The Strongest
  • Bleach Blood War
  • DS - Blade of Hashira
  • ONE PIECE Bounty Rush
  • ONE PIECE TREASURE CRUISE

About the The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Developers

The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross is developed by a fairly large and popular company - Netmarble. The company is located in South Korea and has already released numerous games for different tastes. Here are some of them:

  • Lineage 2: Revolution
  • Marvel Future Fight
  • BTS World
  • Blade & Soul Revolution

In March 2020, Netmarble earned on The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross over 200 million dollars in revenue, and this was only at the start of the game. Now, the company continues to work on other games actively.

The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross is available on PC, iOS, and Android.

item.title: The Creatures of Middle-earth are a Double-Edged Sword For Tales of the Shire
item.description:
As speculation about Tales of the Shire continues, there are many questions surrounding just how far the game will explore Middle Earth past the titular Shire. Since Tales of the Shire is all about the cozy life simulation experience, there likely won't be much room for a lot of classic themes from The Lord of the Rings franchise to be featured.

It's been a rough few years when it comes to games based on The Lord of the Rings , with Return to Moria being lackluster and Gollum being one of 2023's most notorious releases. This is what makes Tales of the Shire so compelling, because it's completely focused on Hobbits and their relaxing lifestyle. Since the game is in the cozy genre, Tales of the Shire will likely have many features that have become synonymous with low-risk life sim games. However, when it comes to the inclusion of pets, Tales of the Shire has a tough decision to make with Middle-earth's creatures.

The Creatures of Middle-earth Aren't Known for Being Cozy

Lord of the Rings Lacks Cute and Cuddly Fantasy Animals

For the most part, a lot of the creatures and animals showcased throughout The Lord of the Rings are either epic, majestic beings or fearsome monsters. From the friendly, like the Great Eagles, to the harrowing, like Wargs or the Balrog, many of the creatures in the lore are massive. This doesn't exactly meet the criteria for a cozy setting. Since the point of Tales of the Shire is supposed to be a relaxing way to enjoy a portion of Middle-earth, this doesn't leave a lot of options for in-game pets.

Many cozy games feature various pets to choose from. Stardew Valley 's offering of pets has set a fun standard for other games in the genre when it comes to animals, and it would be surprising if Tales of the Shire decided to forego the feature. It's an endearing aspect of cozy games, but it doesn't seem likely that the likes of Shelob or Trolls will be available as pets. Not only would that be terrifying, it wouldn't make any sense for a cozy setting.

One of the most obvious options for in-game pets would be horses. Horses are a major help throughout The Lord of the Rings , and it only makes sense for them to be prevalent in the game's quaint village of Bywater. Since the more exotic creatures in the franchise's lore seem to be of the hulking variety, it's likely that Tales of the Shire will focus on keeping its potential pets simple. It's not too far-fetched to picture life as a Hobbit including the basic household pets, like dogs and cats, and this seems like the most logical route to take. There is also plenty of room to include common farm animals and birds.

Tales of the Shire Living Up To Expectations

There are some high expectations for features in Tales of the Shire . Thanks to the likes of Stardew Valley and Animal Crossing , there is now a specific standard set for games in the cozy genre. Special events, seasons, plenty of cooking recipes, and a large variety of customization are just a few of the many things lovers of the genre will be expecting, and Tales of the Shire will hopefully offer plenty of these features while adding its own unique twist that keeps it grounded in The Lord of the Rings lore.

Having an adorable pet to keep one company while playing the game is just an extra cherry on top of the relaxing atmosphere, so there will hopefully at least be a few options for animal companions. As of now, there is still a lot of mystery surrounding Tales of the Shire , and once the game finally launches, it will hopefully hold up to other titles in the genre.

item.title: AFK Journey Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All AFK Journey Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for AFK Journey

In this article, you will learn about all the codes for a cool adventure RPG game called AFK Journey . With the help of them, you can get plenty of diamonds and gold, which you can spend on any of your needs. No one knows when these codes will expire, so hurry and redeem all of them while you still have the chance.

Updated July 13, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This article has been updated to include all active codes. Check back later for more rewards.

All AFK Journey Codes

Working AFK Journey Codes

  • MARKIJOURNEY - Redeem this code to get 1000 diamonds and 50000 gold. (NEW)
  • PLUTOMALLEXTRA5% - Redeem this code to get 100 diamonds and 20000 gold.
  • AFKJN2024 - Redeem this code to get 188 diamonds and 18000 gold.

Expired Codes

  • hwidnabwbd
  • LILITH11AFKJ
  • AFKJLILYPICHU
  • AFKJRUBBERROSS
  • AFKJLUDWIG
  • AFKJNEWSEASON
  • AFKJVOLKIN
  • AFKJBARRY
  • AFKJMTASHED
  • AFKJZEEEBO
  • AFKJCREATIONFEST
  • AFKJUPDATE
  • AFKJCCPROGRAM
  • AFKJAPRIL20
  • AFKJourneyAlpharad
  • AFKJourneyPRESTON
  • AFKJourneyHI
  • AFKJourneySpecialEDD
  • AFKJourneyRUG
  • AFKJourneyPG0
  • AFKJourneyLGIO
  • AFKJourneyJianhao
  • afkjourneyjoshdub
  • AFKJourneyVIVA
  • AFKJourneyTGT
  • AFKJourneyVG
  • AFKJourneyNOGLA
  • AFKJourneyCMK
  • AFKJourneyCarbot
  • AFKJourneyMSA
  • AFKJourneyDE
  • AFKJourneySqueezie
  • AFKJourney88
  • AFKJourneyZanny
  • AFKJourneyTT
  • AFKJourneyCreator
  • AFKJourneyZekiaPax
  • AFKJourneyDishPax
  • AFKJourneyLilyPax
  • AFKJourneyArt
  • AFKJourneyPAX
  • WELCOME
  • LAUNCH
  • BETATESTING

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, getting some free gold and diamonds is always a plus. You can spend it on upgrading your characters, unlocking new ones, or buying the necessary items and equipment to be more effective in battle. Luckily, the developers are generous and often add new AFK Journey codes so you can use them and progress more quickly.

How to Redeem Codes for AFK Journey

Fortunately, redeeming AFK Journey codes is not difficult, and compared to most other games of this genre, you can do it directly in the game, rather than in a browser. Before you can redeem the codes, you will need to complete the tutorial, which will take a total of 5–10 minutes, depending on whether you skip dialogue. After clearing the tutorial, you'll be free to follow these detailed instructions on how to redeem the codes in AFK Journey :

  • After launching the game, pay attention to the lower-right corner. There will be a button with three lines on the icon and you should click on it.
  • Once you do this, you will be taken to a new menu with many options and buttons.
  • In the lower-right corner of this menu, you will notice a button with a gear icon. Click on it to open the settings menu.
  • Once you open the settings menu, you will notice many different options and several tabs that you can switch between in the top section of the menu. Among these tabs, interact with the last one that says Other.
  • Once you open this tab, you will again see plenty of buttons that are divided into three sections.
  • In the second section, called Others, there will be a Promo Code button. It is the last one in the first row and you have to click on it.
  • After doing this, you will open the redemption menu, where there will be an input field and two buttons, one with a cross and the other with a check mark. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above active codes into the input field.
  • Once you've done that, click on the green checkmark button to submit your reward request.
  • If you did everything correctly, you will see a notification on the screen listing the rewards you have received.

Be sure to redeem all the codes as soon as possible, as they may expire, and you will miss out on the rewards forever.
